creator: gbadine@csub.edu
text:
We just upgraded from McAfee Enterprise VirusScan 7.1 to 8.0i.  After this 
upgrade logging off, restarting, and shutting down of the OS can take 
minutes.  However, once I restart or turn off the Apache2 service the system 
performs the above normally.

I spoke with McAfee and they have concluded there is a conflict between their 
service and the Apache2 service and also requested that I start a bug report 
here so that they can work with you to resolve this issue.

This issue all machines I run Apache2 and 8.0i on.  One running WindowsXP 
Professional and two running Windows 2003 Server.
